awards.text: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 4 wins & 10 nominations.

fullplot: A nurse and her surgeon-lover are part of a resistance movement in 1940s Czechoslovakia. When they are discovered, her lover flees and she must find a place to hide. A patient whose life she saved, a man from a remote mountain village where time stopped 150 years ago, agrees to hide her as his wife.

title: Zelary

tomatoes.consensus: Zelary is a satisfyingly old-fashioned romance with an epic sweep.
